https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6CinZIaq9UNaWbRsFfpHe6GZejj.jpg Three generations of small town rebel-rebels crash into each other and burn in Todd Verow's new film, A Sudden Loss of Gravity. The small town of Bangor Maine is finally entering the 80's with a pile-up of new wave proportions. Based on true stories of the Northeastern town. A Sudden Loss of Gravity
